response.overview: When what is supposed to be a festive Christmas party is unexpectedly ruined by an unwanted guest, a full-on brutal fight breaks out. Friendships are questioned, the party becomes no longer fun, and creates the questions, what do the holidays really mean and how do we choose to spend them?
response.tagline: CAN'T A GUY BRING SOME FESTIVITY TO THE CROWD?
response.title: Festivity
